room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Miami
review: Wayyyyy super fun! Even if you arent 16 years old you will have a blast! Especially if you grab a few drinks before.But be prepared to sweat like crazy! its like being in a real like video game!!

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Miami
review: I did my twins birthday there. We all love it. Our host was excellent in everything, so courteous and friendly. The price is worth it. The boys and friends had a blast. We are looking forward to go again.

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Miami
review: Our daughter and her friends did the escape room and they said it was OK. Kind of cheesy for 15 year olds. They had fun just not something they want to do again. Staff was super friendly and very informative.
